message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $95. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $70. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
Thanks for your interest, Bob. While I understand your offer, the product's value is quite a bit higher to me. Could you do $85?
I'm still interested in the product, but I'm not willing to go above $75. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  How about we split the difference and land at $80? This is my final offer.
I'm willing to meet you at $78. That's as high as I'm willing to go.
